Pre-Game Insights: Apostolos Stamatelopoulos is back in the Subway Socceroos squad and is determined to make an impact in our upcoming FIFA World Cup 2026 Round Three qualifiers against China PR and Japan.
The team is disappointed about not getting the first wins but the mood is high and I think we're going to go in and put in a good performance on Thursday night.
Apostolos Stamatelopoulos believes he can score in every game of football and is looking forward to playing at Adelaide Oval.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at Adelaide Oval on Thursday, 10 October 2024, with kick-off at 7:30 pm ACDT (8:00pm AEDT).
Tickets start from $15 Child, $20 Concession, $29 Adult, and $58 Family. Tickets from Ticketek.
The match will be broadcast on 10, 10 Play and Paramount+.
Others: Apostolos Stamatelopoulos has been adapting to life in Scotland and has been playing for his new club Motherwell.
He is looking forward to playing in front of a home crowd at Adelaide Oval and is confident in his goal-scoring abilities.
